data.name: CreateFile
data.description: Creates a new file with the specified content at the given path. This function allows you to create files in any directory with custom content.
data.function: codebolt.fs.createFile(fileName: string, source: string, filePath: string)
data.input_example: const result = await codebolt.fs.createFile('example.txt', 'File content here', '/home/user/documents');
data.input_variable_description: The fileName parameter specifies the file name, source contains the file content, and filePath specifies the directory path.
data.raw_content: Creates a new file with the specified content at the given path for organizing project files.
